#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,odd,even,a[10000],i;
    cin>>n;
    odd=0;even=0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]%2==0)
            even++;
        else
            odd++;
    }
    if(even>=odd)
        cout<<even-odd<<endl;
    else
        cout<<odd-even<<endl;
    return 0;
}
